title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single command-line tool and Docker-like model management.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API for chatting, embedding and pulling models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’) with model switching, RAG and user auth.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for integrating Ollama into Rails or Sinatra apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with readline history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s UI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-curated recipes showing how to run Ollama with Docker, Kubernetes, GPU stacks, and edge devices.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module that injects an Ollama service with decorators for streaming chat endpoints.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers inside CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for vector search and generation.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency TypeScript client published on npm that mirrors the official JS library with added retry logic.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component that turns any Ollama model into a chat web app in <50 lines of code.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client generated from OpenAPI spec, available as ‘github.com/ollama/ollama/go’.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image (ollama/ollama) with CUDA and ROCm variants plus Compose examples.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models via slash commands and threads.
